issue.title: [Website] Add a security page to track when vulnerabilities are patched
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7175](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7175). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
we might also want to give a brief tutorial on safely using the C++ library  (e.g. pointers to validation methods).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7175?focusedCommentId=17128548) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Spark (e.g.) has http://spark.apache.org/security.html. I can add something like this as part of the website work I'm doing. Can you point me to references on any past CVEs for arrow?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7175?focusedCommentId=17129857) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Nm, looks like the 2 from 0.15.1 are the only ones we've had, according to the mailing list. I've done this now.
